review_blob: I rate this beer as average mainly cause I have never had anything quite like it so there is room to grow.  The aroma is perplexing.  Youre not too sure whats coming up.  As for the taste, Im not sure how Left Hand was able to liquefy salmon dip but they did.  Was only able to try a small portion so it might have grown on me
beer_name: Left Hand SmokeJumper Imperial Smoked Porter

review_blob: I felt that this was an extremely good IPA contrary to the mundane words and scores from others.  Full of life this IPA stands out to me because it tastes bright.  The hops are a bit subdued yet fully present.  Nice color and aroma.  Highly recommend this

Not impressed with this one at all and I usually love Rogue products!  I really couldnt get over the aroma-smelled like old Bud.  The cloudy look of a pale ale is new to me but I pushed that aside.  The sweet juniper makes a very brief stab at the tongue but overall very malty for a pale and unsatisfying.
Love it! A well balanced porter that will carry you the whole night through.  Malty with a nice roasted taste. very smooth after taste.  If only I could get some in North Carolina!
Attacks the tip of the tongue with flavor!  You can really taste the orange peel and it balances out for a smooth after taste!  Refreshing indeed!
